content.html: I'm still puzzled that there is no first-class support for OpenAPI spec in Spring Boot. Without getting again into the conversation if OpenAPI is the right thing to do, realistically - this is the industry standard.
content.value:
I'm still puzzled that there is no first-class support for OpenAPI spec in Spring Boot. 

Without getting again into the conversation if OpenAPI is the right thing to do, realistically - this is the industry standard.
